name: 霍弘毅
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule: This course will be divided into two parts: Grammar/Writing and Reading/Comprehension/Vocabulary. A portion of your grade will come from the NTUT Mid-Term and Final Exams, and a portion will come from Dr. Wall’s Mid-Term and Final Exams. Generally we will learn and apply Grammar to Writing during the one-hour class and Reading/Comprehension/Vocabulary during the two hour class. During class Dr. Wall will stress what vocabulary words to remember. Both Dr. Wall Exams will be open book.
scorePolicy:
NTUT Mid-Term 15%
NTUT Final 15%
Dr. Wall Mid-Term 30%
Dr. Wall Final 40%
materials:
1. Dr. Wall’s Guides to Formal Grammar, Style Techniques, and Paragraphing [Handouts]

2. Chapters from Taipei Tech Design and Arts and Humanities Readers to be uploaded and printed out by the students
